summary: E2E testing of WhatsApp NDA Signing feature for Right Doers World Pvt Ltd. All 18 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI loads correctly at /whatsapp, /whatsapp-signing, and /nda-signing routes with 3 tabs (Send NDA, Send Offer, Request Approval), Recent Signings sidebar, and How it Works section. WhatsApp messages are SIMULATED (Twilio not configured).

issues: WhatsApp NDA Signing link not visible on landing page /welcome - users need to navigate directly to /whatsapp

passed_tests: GET /api/whatsapp/status returns service status with simulation_mode=true
POST /api/whatsapp/nda/send creates NDA signing request with OTP
POST /api/whatsapp/nda/send with missing fields returns 422 validation error
POST /api/whatsapp/offer/send creates offer signing request with OTP
POST /api/whatsapp/offer/send with missing fields returns 422 validation error
GET /api/whatsapp/signings returns list of signing requests
GET /api/whatsapp/signings?limit=5 respects limit parameter
GET /api/whatsapp/signings?status=otp_sent filters by status
POST /api/whatsapp/approval/request creates founder approval request
POST /api/whatsapp/verify with invalid signing_id returns 404
POST /api/whatsapp/verify with wrong OTP returns failure message
GET /api/whatsapp/nda/view/{nda_id} returns 404 for nonexistent NDA
GET /api/whatsapp/offer/view/{offer_id} returns 404 for nonexistent offer
GET /api/whatsapp/nda/view/{nda_id} returns HTML after NDA is sent
POST /api/whatsapp/incoming with HELP returns help text
POST /api/whatsapp/incoming with unknown command handled gracefully
POST /api/whatsapp/welcome sends welcome notification
Complete E2E NDA signing flow (Send -> View -> List -> Verify with OTP)
WhatsApp Signing page loads at /whatsapp route
WhatsApp Signing page loads at /whatsapp-signing route
WhatsApp Signing page loads at /nda-signing route
NDA tab shows form with recipient name, phone, email fields
Offer tab shows form with candidate name, phone, position, division fields
Request Approval tab shows form for founder approval requests
Recent Signings sidebar displays signing history with status badges
How it Works section explains 4-step signing process
Send NDA button creates signing request and shows success toast
Send Offer button creates signing request and shows success toast
Simulation Mode badge visible (Twilio not configured)
action_items: Consider adding WhatsApp NDA Signing link to landing page /welcome for discoverability
critical_code_review_comments: WhatsApp NDA Signing implementation is complete and well-structured
All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
OTP-based digital signatures with SHA256 hash generation working correctly
Simulation mode properly logs messages instead of sending via Twilio
MongoDB collections used: whatsapp_signings, whatsapp_approvals, legal_documents
Founder approval workflow sends notifications to FOUNDER_WHATSAPP number
NDA/Offer HTML documents generated and stored for viewing

mocked_api.WhatsApp Messages: SIMULATED - Twilio not configured. Messages logged but not actually sent via WhatsApp. For production, configure TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN, and TWILIO_WHATSAPP_NUMBER in backend/.env

seed_data_creation: Test signing requests created during testing (prefixed with TEST-)
context_for_next_testing_agent: WhatsApp NDA Signing is a new feature for Right Doers World Pvt Ltd. Key features: 1) Send NDA documents via WhatsApp for digital signing, 2) Send Offer Letters via WhatsApp for acceptance, 3) OTP-based digital signatures (6-digit OTP, 24-48 hour expiry), 4) Founder approval workflow, 5) Message tracking and status updates. The system runs in SIMULATION MODE - Twilio is NOT configured, so messages are logged but not actually sent. For production, TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN, and TWILIO_WHATSAPP_NUMBER need to be configured in backend/.env. Backend APIs at /api/whatsapp/* all working. Frontend at /whatsapp, /whatsapp-signing, /nda-signing routes. MongoDB collections: whatsapp_signings, whatsapp_approvals, legal_documents.
